name: Frosthaven
theme: Frosthaven is the story of a small outpost far to the north of the capital city of White Oak, an outpost barely surviving the harsh weather as well as invasions from forces both known and unknown.
premise: A group of mercenaries at the end of their rope will help bring back this settlement from the edge of destruction.
description: Frosthaven is a standalone adventure from the designer and publisher of Gloomhaven that features sixteen new characters, three new races, more than twenty new enemies, more than one hundred new items, and a new, 100-scenario campaign. Characters and items from Gloomhaven will be usable in Frosthaven, and vice versa. In addition to having the well-known combat mechanisms of Gloomhaven, Frosthaven will feature much more to do outside of combat, such as numerous mysteries to solve, a seasonal event system to live through, and player control over how this ramshackle village expands, with each new building offering new ways to progress.
total_playtime_notes: This is based on the game's 100 scenarios, with each scenario estimated to take between 30-120 minutes. Actual total playtime may vary greatly depending on the pace and decisions of the players.
session_playtime_notes: Playtime can vary greatly depending on the scenario and players' decisions.

mechanics.name: Strategy
mechanics.description: Frosthaven is a strategic game, where players must make decisions that will affect the outcome of their game over the course of multiple turns and scenarios.

mechanics.name: Campaign / Battle Card Driven
mechanics.description: The game is driven by a campaign with scenarios that are impacted by the use of cards in battle. Players' decisions and card play in one scenario can have lasting effects.

mechanics.name: Communication Limits
mechanics.description: The game imposes limits on communication between players, adding an extra layer of challenge.

mechanics.name: Cooperative Game
mechanics.description: Frosthaven is a cooperative game where players work together to succeed in their shared goals.

mechanics.name: Deck Construction
mechanics.description: Players have the ability to construct their own decks, allowing for customization and strategy in game play.

mechanics.name: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building
mechanics.description: The game includes mechanics where players build or improve a deck, bag, or pool of options over the course of the game.

immersiveness_level_notes: The game offers a rich and immersive experience through its narrative campaign and the player's ability to shape the development of the outpost.
learning_curve_notes: The game is complex and might be challenging for new players.
save_mechanism_notes: The game's progress is saved through its campaign structure.

reasons: Frosthaven is a strategic game that requires careful planning and decision making.

setup.footprint_notes: The game requires a substantial amount of table space for the game board, player boards, and cards.
setup.time_notes: Setting up the game, especially for the first time, may take a considerable amount of time due to the number of components and game rules.
setup.complexity_notes: Setting up the game involves preparing the game board, player boards, cards, and understanding the game rules.

rule_complexity_notes: The game has a high complexity rating due to its variety of mechanisms and deep strategic elements.
mastery_curve_notes: Mastering the game requires a deep understanding of its mechanisms, strategic planning, and the ability to adapt to various scenarios and challenges.
additional_notes: Frosthaven offers a robust crafting system and a dynamic village expansion system, providing players with numerous ways to progress and develop their outpost. It integrates with Gloomhaven, allowing characters and items to be used interchangeably between the games.
